import {useState} from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Etapa1() { const navigate = useNavigate() const [select, setSelect] = useState("") const mudaTela = (e) => { {select === "Ensino médio incompleto" || "Ensino médio incompleto" ? setSelect(navigate("/tres")) : setSelect(navigate("/dois"))} } return (
